addr: 1000 Elysian Park Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90012
title: Get Lit's Fall Gala: THE POETRY OF SPORTS!
desc: Join us for lunch at the Dodgers Stadium Dugout Club as we bring together icons who have been integral to the history & culture of sports: LA Times sports writer BILL PLASCHKE, Olympic sprinter CARMELITA JETER, Dogtown skater Pep Williams, and more...for an afternoon you won't want to miss! Lunch & cocktails will be served, and the Get Lit Players will perform original pieces inspired by incredible athletic moments in sports...all to raise money to transform education in Los Angeles through our writing programs. For more information, visit www.getlit.org.? ? Join the "Literary Riot!"
